results.title: Placebo-controlled study of lisinopril in congestive heart failure: a multicentre study.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ improved significantly more than placebo-treated @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (p less than 0.05) for all clinical parameters except @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ and @DISEASE_Hemoglobinuria_Paroxysmal @DISEASE_MESH:D006457 @@@paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnoea@@@.

citations.NLM: Chalmers JP, West MJ, Cyran J, De La Torre D, Englert M, Kramar M, Lewis GR, Maranhao MF, Myburgh DP, Schuster P. Placebo-controlled study of lisinopril in congestive heart failure: a multicentre study. J Cardiovasc Pharmacol. 1987;9 Suppl 3():S89-97. PMID: 2442560
citations.BibTeX: @article{2442560, title={Placebo-controlled study of lisinopril in congestive heart failure: a multicentre study.}, author={Chalmers JP and West MJ and Cyran J and De La Torre D and Englert M and Kramar M and Lewis GR and Maranhao MF and Myburgh DP and Schuster P}, journal={J Cardiovasc Pharmacol}, volume={9 Suppl 3}, pages={S89-97}}

results.title: Potentiation of the pro-inflammatory effects of bradykinin by inhibition of angiotensin-converting enzyme and aminopeptidase P in rat paws.
results.text_hl: Bradykinin-induced @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ in normal @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ was increased by @CHEMICAL_1_10_phenanthroline @CHEMICAL_MESH:C025205 @@@o-phenanthroline@@@ (3.10(-2) M), by @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ (10(-6) M to 10(-4) M), by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (10(-6) M to 10(-4), or by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (10(-5) M) in combination with @CHEMICAL_apstatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C097277 @@@apstatin@@@ (8.10(-5) M or 1.4 10(-4) M).

citations.NLM: Damas J, Liégeois JF, Simmons WH. Potentiation of the pro-inflammatory effects of bradykinin by inhibition of angiotensin-converting enzyme and aminopeptidase P in rat paws. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 1996 Nov;354(5):670-6. PMID: 8938668
citations.BibTeX: @article{8938668, title={Potentiation of the pro-inflammatory effects of bradykinin by inhibition of angiotensin-converting enzyme and aminopeptidase P in rat paws.}, author={Damas J and Liégeois JF and Simmons WH}, journal={Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol}, volume={354}, number={5}, pages={670-6}}

results.title: Influence of several peptidase inhibitors on the pro-inflammatory effects of substance P, capsaicin and collagenase.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ pretreated by @CHEMICAL_Methysergide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008784 @@@methysergide@@@, collagenase-induced @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ was reduced and can be increased by @CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@, by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, administered alone or by @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ associated with @CHEMICAL_apstatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C097277 @@@apstatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Damas J, Bourdon V, Liégeois JF, Simmons WH. Influence of several peptidase inhibitors on the pro-inflammatory effects of substance P, capsaicin and collagenase. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 1996 Nov;354(5):662-9. PMID: 8938667
citations.BibTeX: @article{8938667, title={Influence of several peptidase inhibitors on the pro-inflammatory effects of substance P, capsaicin and collagenase.}, author={Damas J and Bourdon V and Liégeois JF and Simmons WH}, journal={Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol}, volume={354}, number={5}, pages={662-9}}

results.title: [Angioneurotic edema caused by angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors].
results.text_hl: While @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ appeared most often after 1 to 21 days, it started within an hour in one @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@, and only after 6 months of therapy in five @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Diehl KL, Wernze H. [Angioneurotic edema caused by angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors]. Dtsch Med Wochenschr. 1992 May 8;117(19):727-32. PMID: 1315673
citations.BibTeX: @article{1315673, title={[Angioneurotic edema caused by angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitors].}, author={Diehl KL and Wernze H}, journal={Dtsch Med Wochenschr}, volume={117}, number={19}, pages={727-32}}

results.title: Multiple digital grengrene arising from traditional therapy: a case report.
results.text_hl: There was @DISEASE_Gangrene @DISEASE_MESH:D005734 @@@gangrene@@@ of the left middle finger and both index toes. @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@Oedema@@@ responded to diuretics, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and low @CHEMICAL_Salts @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012492 @@@salt@@@ diet.

citations.NLM: Unuigbe EI, Ikhidero J, Ogbemudia AO, Bafor A, Isah AO. Multiple digital grengrene arising from traditional therapy: a case report. West Afr J Med. 2009 May;28(3):189-91. PMID: 20306738
citations.BibTeX: @article{20306738, title={Multiple digital grengrene arising from traditional therapy: a case report.}, author={Unuigbe EI and Ikhidero J and Ogbemudia AO and Bafor A and Isah AO}, journal={West Afr J Med}, volume={28}, number={3}, pages={189-91}}

results.title: Multiple digital gangrene arising from traditional therapy: a case report.
results.text_hl: There was @DISEASE_Gangrene @DISEASE_MESH:D005734 @@@gangrene@@@ of the left middle finger and both index toes. @<m>DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@Oedema@@@ responded to diuretics, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and low @CHEMICAL_Salts @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012492 @@@salt@@@ diet.

citations.NLM: Unuigbe EI, Ikhidero J, Ogbemudia AO, Bafor A, Isah AO. Multiple digital gangrene arising from traditional therapy: a case report. West Afr J Med. 2009 Nov-Dec;28(6):397-9. PMID: 20939153
